upgrades.description: A collection of all card upgrades in the game, defining their properties and effects.

ability_upgrade.description: Reference to card specifiying the unit ability upgrade.

allow_secondary_tooltip_placement.description: Whether to allow secondary tooltip placement.

applied_vfx.description: Reference to the VFX played when the upgrade is applied.

bonus_damage.description: Amount of bonus damage to add.

bonus_equipment.description: Amount of bonus equipment slots to add.

bonus_heal.description: Amount of bonus healing to add for spell cards.

bonus_hp.description: Amount of bonus maximum HP to add.

bonus_size.description: Amount of bonus size to add.

bonus_unhealed_hp.description: Amount of bonus unhealed maximum hp to add. Don't use this unless its used for a room. If this is present on a spell/unit that applies an upgrade the unfilled max hp will fall off on death.

card_trigger_upgrades.description: List of card trigger upgrades to apply.

cost_reduction.description: Amount to reduce the card's cost by.

does_not_replace_ability.description: Whether this upgrade should not replace an existing unit ability.

filters.description: List of upgrade filters to apply. Reference to an upgrade mask.

hide_icon_on_card.description: Whether to hide the upgrade icon on the card.

icon.description: Reference to the upgrade's icon sprite.

notifications.description: Notification text to display when the upgrade is applied.

override.description: Whether this upgrade should override an existing upgrade with the same ID (Requires the Unity Asset Name).

remove_trait_upgrades.description: List of trait class names to permanently remove.

remove_vfx.description: Reference to the VFX played when the upgrade is removed.

restrict_size_to_room_capacity.description: Whether to restrict the unit's size to room capacity.

room_modifier_upgrades.description: List of room modifier upgrades to apply.

show_description_on_cards.description: Whether to show the upgrade's description on cards.

status_effect_upgrades.description: List of status effect upgrades to apply.

titles.description: Localized text for this upgrade's title.

trait_upgrades.description: List of trait upgrades to apply.

trigger_upgrades.description: List of trigger upgrades to apply to character.

use_upgrade_highlight_tags.description: Whether to use upgrade highlight tags for upgrade text.

upgrade_will_be_scaled_by_non_magic_powe.description: Only used by Sacrificial Resurrection / Prism Retrieval. This field was added for a bugfix, set to true if this upgrade is intended for units and has its attack damage dynamically generated. This prevents the upgrade from being reset when the unit with the upgrade gets reformed.

x_cost_reduction.description: Amount to reduce X-cost cards by.

items.description: An upgrade definition that specifies the properties and effects of a card upgrade.
